Firmware.name: ArduPilot Mega 2.0 HIL
Firmware.desc:
#define FLIGHT_MODE_CHANNEL 8 #define FLIGHT_MODE_1 AUTO #define FLIGHT_MODE_2 RTL #define FLIGHT_MODE_3 FLY_BY_WIRE_A #define FLIGHT_MODE_4 FLY_BY_WIRE_B #define FLIGHT_MODE_5 STABILIZE #define FLIGHT_MODE_6 MANUAL
#define HIL_PROTOCOL HIL_PROTOCOL_MAVLINK
#define HIL_MODE HIL_MODE_ATTITUDE
#define HIL_PORT 0
#define GPS_PROTOCOL GPS_PROTOCOL_MTK
# define GCS_PROTOCOL GCS_PROTOCOL_MAVLINK # define GCS_PORT 3
#define AIRSPEED_SENSOR ENABLED #define MAGNETOMETER ENABLED #define AIRSPEED_CRUISE 25 #define THROTTLE_FAILSAFE ENABLED

Firmware.name: ArduCopter 2 Quad
Firmware.desc: #define NAV_TEST 1 // 0 = traditional, 1 = rate controlled #define YAW_OPTION 1 // 0 = hybrid rate approach, 1 = offset Yaw approach #define AUTO_RESET_LOITER 1 // enables Loiter to reset it's current location based on stick input. #define FRAME_CONFIG QUAD_FRAME #define FRAME_ORIENTATION X_FRAME #define CHANNEL_6_TUNING CH6_NONE # define LOG_ATTITUDE_FAST DISABLED # define LOG_ATTITUDE_MED DISABLED # define LOG_GPS ENABLED # define LOG_PM ENABLED # define LOG_CTUN ENABLED # define LOG_NTUN ENABLED # define LOG_MODE ENABLED # define LOG_RAW DISABLED # define LOG_CMD ENABLED # define LOG_CURRENT DISABLED #define MOTOR_LEDS 1 // 0 = off, 1 = on #define FR_LED AN12 // Mega PE4 pin, OUT7 #define RE_LED AN14 // Mega PE5 pin, OUT6 #define RI_LED AN10 // Mega PH4 pin, OUT5 #define LE_LED AN8 // Mega PH5 pin, OUT4

Firmware.name: ArduCopter 2 Tri
Firmware.desc: #define NAV_TEST 1 // 0 = traditional, 1 = rate controlled #define YAW_OPTION 1 // 0 = hybrid rate approach, 1 = offset Yaw approach #define AUTO_RESET_LOITER 1 // enables Loiter to reset it's current location based on stick input. #define FRAME_CONFIG TRI_FRAME #define FRAME_ORIENTATION X_FRAME #define CHANNEL_6_TUNING CH6_NONE # define LOG_ATTITUDE_FAST DISABLED # define LOG_ATTITUDE_MED DISABLED # define LOG_GPS ENABLED # define LOG_PM ENABLED # define LOG_CTUN ENABLED # define LOG_NTUN ENABLED # define LOG_MODE ENABLED # define LOG_RAW DISABLED # define LOG_CMD ENABLED # define LOG_CURRENT DISABLED #define MOTOR_LEDS 1 // 0 = off, 1 = on #define FR_LED AN12 // Mega PE4 pin, OUT7 #define RE_LED AN14 // Mega PE5 pin, OUT6 #define RI_LED AN10 // Mega PH4 pin, OUT5 #define LE_LED AN8 // Mega PH5 pin, OUT4

Firmware.name: ArduCopter 2 Hexa
Firmware.desc: #define NAV_TEST 1 // 0 = traditional, 1 = rate controlled #define YAW_OPTION 1 // 0 = hybrid rate approach, 1 = offset Yaw approach #define AUTO_RESET_LOITER 1 // enables Loiter to reset it's current location based on stick input. #define FRAME_CONFIG HEXA_FRAME #define FRAME_ORIENTATION X_FRAME #define CHANNEL_6_TUNING CH6_NONE # define LOG_ATTITUDE_FAST DISABLED # define LOG_ATTITUDE_MED DISABLED # define LOG_GPS ENABLED # define LOG_PM ENABLED # define LOG_CTUN ENABLED # define LOG_NTUN ENABLED # define LOG_MODE ENABLED # define LOG_RAW DISABLED # define LOG_CMD ENABLED # define LOG_CURRENT DISABLED #define MOTOR_LEDS 1 // 0 = off, 1 = on #define FR_LED AN12 // Mega PE4 pin, OUT7 #define RE_LED AN14 // Mega PE5 pin, OUT6 #define RI_LED AN10 // Mega PH4 pin, OUT5 #define LE_LED AN8 // Mega PH5 pin, OUT4

Firmware.name: ArduCopter 2 Y6
Firmware.desc: #define NAV_TEST 1 // 0 = traditional, 1 = rate controlled #define YAW_OPTION 1 // 0 = hybrid rate approach, 1 = offset Yaw approach #define AUTO_RESET_LOITER 1 // enables Loiter to reset it's current location based on stick input. #define FRAME_CONFIG Y6_FRAME #define FRAME_ORIENTATION X_FRAME #define CHANNEL_6_TUNING CH6_NONE # define LOG_ATTITUDE_FAST DISABLED # define LOG_ATTITUDE_MED DISABLED # define LOG_GPS ENABLED # define LOG_PM ENABLED # define LOG_CTUN ENABLED # define LOG_NTUN ENABLED # define LOG_MODE ENABLED # define LOG_RAW DISABLED # define LOG_CMD ENABLED # define LOG_CURRENT DISABLED #define MOTOR_LEDS 1 // 0 = off, 1 = on #define FR_LED AN12 // Mega PE4 pin, OUT7 #define RE_LED AN14 // Mega PE5 pin, OUT6 #define RI_LED AN10 // Mega PH4 pin, OUT5 #define LE_LED AN8 // Mega PH5 pin, OUT4

Firmware.name: ArduCopter 2 Heli (2560 only)
Firmware.desc: #define MAG_ORIENTATION AP_COMPASS_COMPONENTS_UP_PINS_FORWARD #define NAV_TEST 1 // 0 = traditional, 1 = rate controlled #define YAW_OPTION 1 // 0 = hybrid rate approach, 1 = offset Yaw approach, 2 = simple hybrid #define AUTO_RESET_LOITER 1 // enables Loiter to reset it's current location based on stick input. #define CUT_MOTORS 1 // do we cut the motors with no throttle? #define DYNAMIC_DRIFT 0 // careful!!! 0 = off, 1 = on #define CAMERA_STABILIZER ENABLED #define BROKEN_SLIDER 0 #define FRAME_CONFIG HELI_FRAME #define FRAME_ORIENTATION X_FRAME #define CHANNEL_6_TUNING CH6_NONE # define LOG_ATTITUDE_FAST DISABLED # define LOG_ATTITUDE_MED DISABLED # define LOG_GPS ENABLED # define LOG_PM ENABLED # define LOG_CTUN ENABLED # define LOG_NTUN ENABLED # define LOG_MODE ENABLED # define LOG_RAW DISABLED # define LOG_CMD ENABLED # define LOG_CURRENT DISABLED #define MOTOR_LEDS 1 // 0 = off, 1 = on #define FR_LED AN12 // Mega PE4 pin, OUT7 #define RE_LED AN14 // Mega PE5 pin, OUT6 #define RI_LED AN10 // Mega PH4 pin, OUT5 #define LE_LED AN8 // Mega PH5 pin, OUT4
